meanings.definition: A person who is passionate about cinema.
meanings.sent1: Many cineasts enjoy discussing their favorite movies with friends.
meanings.sent2: Film festivals often attract cineasts from all over the world.
meanings.sent3: The cineasts had a movie marathon and popcorn party to celebrate their love for cinema.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cineasts, classic films are like treasured gems waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The cineasts' eyes sparkled with excitement as they entered the movie theater.

meanings.sent1: The cineasts gathered to watch a special screening of a rare film.
meanings.sent2: At the film club meeting, the cineasts shared their thoughts on the latest releases.
meanings.sent3: The group of cineasts decided to start a movie-themed book club for fun.
meanings.sent4: Among the cineasts, there was a shared love for independent cinema.
meanings.sent5: The cineasts' collection of movie tickets was a testament to their passion for film.
